events.message: The insured reported a car collision involving their vehicle and another on the highway at 8 AM today.
Upon review, the claim was categorised under Auto Accident following initial intake and policy verification.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the case to ensure proper handling of the vehicle damage assessment.
The insured received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is under review.
Requested submission of police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and a copy of the driver’s license for claim processing.
The insured provided all requested documents electronically, including the police report and vehicle photos.
Investigation team commenced a detailed review of the collision circumstances and assessed responsibility.
Investigation concluded with verification that the insured was not at fault in the auto accident incident.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repair costs and rental reimbursement was proposed to the insured.
The insured expressed satisfaction with the settlement terms and appreciated the prompt handling of their claim.
Final approval was granted for the claim settlement based on investigation findings and accepted terms.
The payment covering authorized vehicle repairs was issued successfully to the insured’s bank account.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after full settlement and payment issuance.
All claim files and documents were archived securely for future reference as per company policy.
